title: Learning Middle School Spatial Vector Concepts Using Virtual Robotics Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic algebraic operations and 2D geometry concepts
context.additional_context: Parallel use of laboratory and online platforms for real-time interaction and self-directed learning

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and explain vector composition and decomposition in 3D space through virtual robots
Learners develop the ability to quantitatively calculate vector magnitude and direction through virtual robot control simulations
Learners demonstrate a project-based assessment applying spatial vector concepts to robot path design tasks with over 80% completeness.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
